page.title: 18LOCAL TRADE
page.content: IN ADDITION TO THE LARGE SHOPPING CENTRES IN OUR AREA,THERE ARE SEVERAL LOCAL PARADES OF SHOPS LIKE THOSE AT MOTSPUR PARK AND THE PLOUGH,MALDEN ROAD. A SURVEY OF THE FIFTEEN SHOPS AT THE PLOUGH WAS UNDERTAKEN TO FIND OUT IF THEY WERE USING MODERN TECHNOLOGY IN THE DAY TO DAY RUNNING OF THEIR SHOPS. IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THREE OF THE SHOPS USE A COMPUTER FOR STOCK ORDERING WHILST TWELVE USE MODERN EQUIPMENT SUCH AS CALCULATORS AND ELECTRONIC TILLS TO RUN THEIR SHOPS. RESEARCH ALSO REVEALED THAT LOCAL PEOPLE USED THIS SMALL PARADE OF SHOPS EVERY DAY,PROVING THAT THESE SHOPS ARE CONVENIENT AND USEFUL TO THE RESIDENTS OF OUR AREA.
